segments.text: That little boy is about to fall off that stool any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far to reach those cookies, and the stool is wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe he’s that desperate for a snack.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for him to hand her one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t seem worried at all about him falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip backward any moment now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch, but I can’t look away either.
segments.speaker: PAR
